column5: Our group will be doing our usual trip up to Lac Seul this summer and we were looking at doing a one-day fly-in before we started on Lac Seul. We would be looking for a business near/on the way to Ear Falls. I've contacted a few operations, but was wondering if there were any positive experiences or recommendations out there to help us out.Thanks
Where are you staying? Andrea at Goose Bay has offered our group the one day fly-in, check with your outfitter and wait for some more replies to your thread! Good luck!
We are staying at Evergreen Lodge in Ear Falls. We would like to do a one day fly-in the day before our Lac Seul adventure begins.

We have used Wilderness Air out of Vermillion Bay for two trips. Our trip last year was so good two other groups in camp signed up for later that week. They had great experiences also. if you go to the web site you will see a good variety of daily options and prices. The pricing is usually based on air miles. Bob (owner) can pick you up at your camp and take you to the Lake of your choice. Looks like he flys right over Lac Seul to get to most of them anyway. PM me if you need additional information.
Northwinds Canadian Outfitters can set you up with a one day fly in also. Teir base camp is at the crossroads in Vermillion Bay and you would be flying in and out of Vermilion Bay.
Another vote for Wilderness Air.A top notch business !.

When we satyed on L.S. Our group has done one day trips with excellent adventures and gawleys both located in ear falls. We went to 2 lake with gawleys that both had awesome walleye fishing and 1 lake with E.A. That had great fishing for big pike and great walleye! PM me if you would lime more info.
check with patty about a fly in. if she can,t help you ask her to check with rod.
contact faron buckler at excellent adventures - we did two one day trips with him to zinzania and rainfall - "fishing like it used to be." phish
